dunit.output.console

Module to handle output to the console.

License

MIT. See LICENSE for full details.

class Console;

Format output to the console.

void writeHeader();

Write the header.

void writeSuccessMessage();

Write the success message.

void writeFailMessage();

Write the fail message.

void writeDetailedResults(DUnitAssertError[string] results);

Output a detailed report.

Parameters

DUnitAssertError[string] results An array of results.
